titleStmt.title: By the Queene. A proclamation to forbid all maner of persons to resort to any townes held by the French Kings rebels, or to traffique with any of them, vpon paine to be punished as traitors with a declaration of the iust causes of the said prohibition. Giuen vnder her Maiesties signet at Greenwich the xiiij. day of Aprill 1591, and of her Maiesties reigne the xxxiij. yere.
Proclamations. 1591-04-14
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the deputies of Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
